title: 10 Pack SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light 15Amp 120/277Volt Rocker Single Pole Wall Switch, Automatic On/Off Sensor

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #32,137 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #111 in Electrical Light Switches       #111 in Electrical Light Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Not Only A Light Switch: This night light switch legantly blends the features of a wall switch and nightlight together, frees up outlets, and no more worry about the night light would be carried off and lost by the toddlers, you can sleep easy now

SMART ILLUMINATION: Built in dusk to dawn sensor, automatically turns on only when ambient lighting becomes insufficient and load is OFF. Perfect for hallway, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, home theater, pantry, nursery, and anywhere you need a guiding light.

EASY INSTALLATION: The lighted light switch does not require a neutral, it is easy to replace your kids night lights or the standard switches in nursery with the included wiring instructions. The special pilot light switch can add a contemporary look to a room

STANDARD SWITCH: Single pole electrical wall light switch, rating 15Amp 120/277Volt. Back insert and side terminal wiring, grounding screw. Compatible with LED,Incandescent,CFL, Halogen and Fluorescent lighting. Use with standard wall plate(sold separately)

HIGH QUALITY: Durable construction made of high-quality, impact resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel. Gorgeously designed with a modern minimalist look, and the sturdy construction for long service life.

customers_say: Customers find the light switches easy to install with clear instructions and appreciate their appearance and value for money. The functionality and brightness receive mixed feedback - while some say they work well and are perfect for dark rooms, others report issues with the LED lights not working correctly and very low lighting. Build quality is also mixed, with some saying they're nice for a few weeks while others report them breaking on the first day.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to install and they work!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are great! You just wire them like any other switch and you have a built in night light. I have found them especially useful in hallways and in garages (where I may tumble down stairs if I don't have a bit of light). Easy to install and they work.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect amount of light
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are the best.  Gives a bit of light when dark, we have now installed these in every hallway and stairwell.  I bought single pull and double, the double has a light on both sides.  I am so happy I found these!!

customer_reviews.review_snippet: My nightlight will not come on. I bought a box of these so seven out of ten worked, but three would not light in darkness

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsConvenient Light Switch with Built-In Night Light and Automatic Sensor
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I recently installed the SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light in my home, and it has been a great addition. The built-in LED night light is a fantastic feature, especially in hallways and bathrooms where extra visibility at night is helpful. The automatic on/off sensor works well, adjusting the brightness depending on the ambient light in the room, which helps to save energy.The installation process was straightforward and comparable to a standard light switch, making it a good choice for anyone comfortable with basic electrical work. The switch itself has a nice modern design and feels durable. One thing to note is that the LED light is quite bright, which might be a bit too much for some people in a bedroom setting. However, it’s perfect for areas where you need a bit of guidance at night.Overall, I highly recommend the SOZULAMP Light Switch for anyone looking to add a convenient night light feature to their home without the need for separate plug-in night lights. It’s functional, energy-efficient, and looks great.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: works well in my home keeps the room lit even after turning off
